casebody.data:
Thomas A. Stokes, III, Plaintiff
v.
Drug Safety Alliance, Inc., a wholly owned subsidiary of UDG Healthcare PLC; Catherine Crumpton, Douglas Townsend, Jr.; and Tempusdurham, LLC ; Defendants No. COA15-382 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: November 1, 2016

REVERSED AND REMANDED IN PART, DISMISSED IN PART.
